attributes.action: Open UK border to Ukrainians fleeing the Russian invasion
attributes.background: Open our borders to Ukrainians feeling the Russian invasion regardless to whether or not they have family here in the U.K. We have a moral obligation to help those fleeing the war. Many of our neighbours have waived visa requirements in the face of the unfolding crisis. We should do the same.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
